body.p: Here we document the building of our e-dictionaries.

section.title: Files
section.p: This document is meant for dictionary builders here at Giellatekno. The documentation will also be relevant for anyone wanting to build e-dictionaries of this type.
We use the Macintosh Dictionary for Mac OS 10.5 and StarDict for other platforms.

section.title: Compilation process
section.p: The makefile for generating dictionary paradigms is found in $LANG/testing/.
